data.title: Philadelphia Wedding Bands
data.meta_description: Don Eaton Band keeps the party moving nonstop with a rhythm and flow like no other party band or wedding band in the Philadelphia area. See us live!
data.text:
ðŸŽ· Don Eaton Band

A common theme when planning a wedding party, corporate event, or fundraiser is coming up with new ideas to make your event unique and unforgettable. Couples aspire to host an original and fantastic wedding, one that family members and friends will rave about for years to come. Party planners for weddings and fundraisers strive to create the most sophisticated and entertaining event ever. What then, is the best way to accomplish the common goal? How does one create an atmosphere that keeps guests feeling engaged, vibrant and energetic, as though they're comfortable enough to get up out of their seats, dance and put their hands in the air without a care? Perhaps the solution is to find a great band - not just a generic name on a rotating list provided by an entertainment agency, but a real band, an independent band that has preformed together as a professional team for large and diverse groups of people for well over a decade. Our band has performed for years as a band with the same members for hundreds of parties, weddings and private events. A band that has inspired thousands, yes thousands of people to dance and cheer for more. Don't hesitate. Be the couple who goes the distance and hires the premiere Philadelphia party band the Don Eaton Band.

The award winning Don Eaton Band is the top choice of Philadelphia brides who are creating the party of a lifetime. Our band has been inspiring magical memories at Philadelphia weddings for over 19 years. We bring unparalleled enthusiasm and energy to every wedding party and event we play. Many of the band members are nationally recognized while having toured and recorded with renowned bands and artists. The Don Eaton Band plays an extensive selection of different musical genres including current contemporary music, Motown, traditional and contemporary jazz, country pop, classic rock, and more. Our repertoire is vast with six lead vocalists and the blazing Saturday Night horn section. It's no wonder that The Don Eaton Band is one of the most sought after and unique wedding party bands in the Philadelphia area.

As Master of Ceremonies and leader of the band, Don works closely with all couples and clients to create a plan and customize the music while scripting a detailed timeline for every event. We pride ourselves in being the best Philadelphia wedding band as well as the top Philly party band. It is our goal to create a musical journey that is a reflection of the unique personalities of our couples while at the same time continuously keeping everyone engaged. As our testimonials and independent reviews unanimously say, we will add a highly rewarding dynamic to your special wedding or special event. There is only one Don Eaton Band.

The first step to making your wedding party extraordinary is by contacting The Don Eaton Band, inducted into the Knot Best of Weddings HALL OF FAME, and recipient of both The Knot "Best of Weddings" and The Wedding Wire "Bride's Choice Award".
